original_title: Foolish Mortals: A Haunted Mansion Documentary
overview: Foolish Mortals is a documentary that focuses on the fan culture surrounding Disneyâ€™s Haunted Mansion!  Some of the people in the film are Disney legend Rolly Crump, artist Topher Adam, former Imagineer Jason Surrell, Robert Kurtzman, Dutch Bihary, Sandie Schnieder, Imagineer Terri Hardin, Mike Mendez, Spooky Dan Walker, Lance Henriksen, and many more!
title: Foolish Mortals: A Haunted Mansion Documentary
